page.title: 05Transport
page.content: We did a survey of the types of transport owned by families in the Donisthorpe area.184 families were questioned and the results are given below. 1.The most popular make of car was Ford followed by British Leyland. 2.The most popular colour of car was red followed by blue,brown,green, white,cream,grey,silver and black. 3.There were 50 families with 2 cars. 4.The most popular make of the second car was Ford. 5.The most popular colour of the second car was blue followed by green, white,silver,yellow,grey,brown,red, black,cream,orange and purple. 6.Most families had at least one other form of transport,usually a bicycle. 7.There were 27 families without a car.
